Reference
=========

The public API is available directly by importing from `mal_scraper`,
for example::

	import mal_scraper

	mal_scraper.get_anime  # Core API
	mal_scraper.AiringStatus.ongoing  # Constants/Enumerations
	mal_scraper.ParseError  # Exceptions

.. toctree::
    :glob:

    mal_scraper*
    consts*
    exceptions*
